item.title: The options America faces in Iran
item.description: Donald Trump promises to “rescue” Iranian protesters. How could he try?

item.title: Israel hopes for regime change in Iran
item.description: But its main concern remains Iran’s ballistic missiles and nuclear programme

item.title: Pessimism is the world’s main economic problem
item.description: Gloomy expectations are starting to matter more than the data

item.title: Europe and South America seal a trade pact for the Trump era
item.description: The EU-Mercosur agreement is a big deal in the world of geoeconomics

item.title: The big ambitions of China’s private space industry
item.description: Chinese firms race to catch up with SpaceX

item.title: New in SpyWeek: Startling New Details on Maduro Raid as Trump Hints More Covert Action to Come—Without Tulsi's Help
item.description: Gabbard is out of the loop as Trump also eyes Cuba, Iran, even Greenland following masterful Maduro intel op, putting the future of NATO in question.
